title: 帧数总是从800帧突降至1帧
author: Bilibili黑炽
txt_content: 帧数总是从800帧突降至1帧，论坛上各种优化帧数的mod都用了也没用

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
-Xmx6144M -Xms6144M -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CMSIncrementalMode -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -Xmn1536M -XX:CompileThreshold=1

还在用CMS

但是我复制快啊 (来自正版启动器的def参数+魔改的
